description:
Don't let the winter weather get the best of you. With Ultra Lite Balsam socks, you can keep your feet warm in style. These lightweight, crew-length socks feature a captivating tree-themed pattern and are your answer to icy temperatures.

  • Heavy-weight thermal yarn for extra warmth
  • Lightweight profile, perfect for snug-fitting shoes
  • Moisture wicking to keep you dry all day
  • Soft brushed inside pile provides comfort and extra warmth
  • Non-binding, diabetic-friendly design provides relief for cold feet due to circulation problems
name: Heat Holders Ultra Lite Balsam Socks - Men's
